alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 26 at 8:08PM PDT until March 27 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The coos, Curry, and Douglas county coasts, including Reedsport, Lakeside, North Bend, Coos Bay, Bandon, Coquille, Myrtle Point, Port Orford, Gold Beach, and Brookings. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
